Summer 2025 Engineering Intern
TechStartup

Location: Remote (US only)
Type: Internship
Duration: 10-12 weeks, Summer 2025
Pay: $40-50/hour

About TechStartup
We're a fast-growing startup building the future of developer tools. Join us for a summer of impact!

What You'll Do
Build features that ship to production
Work directly with senior engineers
Participate in code reviews and design discussions

Requirements
Currently pursuing a degree in Computer Science or related field
Experience with Python, JavaScript, or Go
Strong problem-solving skills
Available full-time for Summer 2025

Work Authorization
Important: We are unable to sponsor work visas at this time. Candidates must be authorized to work in the United States without requiring sponsorship now or in the future. This includes US Citizens, Permanent Residents, and those with valid OPT/CPT authorization.

Posted: December 17, 2024
Apply by: January 31, 2025
